name: Millers Distillery
description:
In this Distillery Simulator - Use Barrels to Power your kettle and keep your whiskey moving out the door. Use the Handbook to understand all aspects of the recipe and beware don't let the fire Burn Out!

Known Bugs :

Well the progression past the second barrel seems to be broken. on the exports. so its a lot shorter than it should be. I will have to fix that after the Jam (added a bug at midnight) 

Barrels will stack on top of themselves when you complete quests. just drag them away!

Weird Error on Export - Barrel disappears when clicking it to empty barley
